verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. oil prices] [V: fell] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG4: below $ 70 a barrel] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump tweeted that he would announce a decision on the Iranian deal Tuesday afternoon] .
